name: mechanicshopapi
description: A portfolio RESTful API CRUD demo project built using Node.js, Express.js, and a MySQL database with Sequelize ORM, displaying a work management system for a fictitious mechanic shop. Inspired by prior work for my mechanic. Enjoy!
author: Ryan Hunter | GitHub handle: SystemsVanguard | Web: www.RyanHunter.org | Email: ryan@RyanHunter.org
